head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths MEIL, SANDRA ERARD

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths MEIL, SANDRA ERARD

block.p: MEIL--Sandra Erard, January 4, 2007, beloved wife of Philip Erard, loving sister of Marlene Grissom and Phyllis Ossen, and devoted aunt to five nephews and nieces; and eight grand nephews and nieces. Friends may call Wednesday January 10 from 7 to 9 PM at Frank E. Campbell 1076 Madison Avenue at 81st St. Burial Private.

MEIL--Sandra Erard, January 4, 2007, beloved wife of Philip Erard, loving sister of Marlene Grissom and Phyllis Ossen, and devoted aunt to five nephews and nieces; and eight grand nephews and nieces.
